brotherFemi.title: Bond Servant of Christ
brotherFemi.details: I am Brother Femi, a bond servant of the Lord Jesus Christ. I am constantly learning His ways from the Bible and others, and gradually working to become more like Him by the day.

text: On the 22nd of June 2025, at HOWJ Atlanta I had a life-changing encounter with the Lord Jesus Christ. It was a moment of divine personal conviction, revelation and transformation that set me on a new path of faith and purpose - I had a strong nudge in my soul to search God afresh at all cost. Since then, I have been committed to living as a bond servant of Christ, seeking to know Him more deeply and to reflect His love and grace in all aspects of my life.
This website is a faith-inspired space to share my journey, connect with fellow believers, and encourage a Christ-centered life of love, humility, and purpose.
I look forward to hearing from you, sharing insights, and growing together in faith. May the grace and peace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you always.

heartCry: Father set me free from the spirit of pride that thinks it can sustain righteous
Father, purge and purify every bit of SIN/Concupiscence out of my life
My Father, count me amongst those you will have mercy on today (Rom 9)
Give me the ability to obey you promptly without negotiations!

anchor.title: Acts 5:41-42 KJV
anchor.bibleVerse: And they departed from the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name. And daily in the temple, and in every house, they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ.
